name: Mini Land
description:
Mini Land is a short and simple point&click tile game approachable for everyone !

The goal is to reach the highest score you can. Every game is a win, but if you reach over 750+ point, you're a real artist !
How do you play ? Simply click on the slot on which you wish to put down the next tile, displayed on the bottom right corner of your screen :)

Assets :

Tiles and Hexes : 2D Painted Terrain, David Baugmart

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/tiles-and-hexes-2d-painted...

Backgrounds :

Mountain Top, Pilipp A. Urlich

https://www.artstation.com/artwork/X14kxy

Also a huge thanks to my fellow comrade Mateo Schell-Wack for the help throughout the entire making of this project.
